text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition bc-license-status-extension

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*ExtensionBC License Status Extension
extension 4..*ExtensionExtension
Slices for extension Content/Rules for all slices
extension:statusCode S1..1ExtensionExtension
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"statusCode"
value[x] S1..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
Binding: BC License Status Value Set (required)
extension:statusReasonCode S1..1ExtensionExtension
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"statusReasonCode"
value[x] S1..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
Binding: BC License Status Reason Value Set (required)
extension:statusClassCode S1..1ExtensionExtension
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"statusClassCode"
value[x] S0..1CodeableConceptAE | LIC
Binding: BC License Status Class Value Set (required)
extension:period S1..1ExtensionExtension
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"period"
value[x] S1..1PeriodValue of extension
extension:endReason S0..1CodeableConceptBC End Reason Extension
URL: http://hlth.gov.bc.ca/fhir/provider/StructureDefinition/bc-end-reason-extension
Binding: BC End Reason Value Set (required)
extension:owner S0..1IdentifierBC Owner Extension
URL: http://hlth.gov.bc.ca/fhir/provider/StructureDefinition/bc-owner-extension
url 1..1uri"http://hlth.gov.bc.ca/fhir/provider/StructureDefinition/bc-license-status-extension"
value[x] 0..0

Documentation for this format

name: LicenseStatusExtension
title: BC License Status Extension
description: Tracking the status and changes to the status of a practitioner/organization license.

element.definition: Tracking the status and changes to the status of a practitioner/organization license.

Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
